rows.label: qst105602_msg001
rows.name: 鍵は一体どこにいってしまったのか――

rows.label: qst105602_msg201
rows.name: 反乱した兵士たちが白状した

rows.label: qst105602_msg202
rows.name:
あの書類を奪って彼らだけは
正式にアデルに認めてもらおうとしている

rows.label: qst105602_msg301
rows.name: 反乱した兵士たちが白状した

rows.label: qst105602_msg302
rows.name:
あの書類を奪って彼らだけは
正式にアデルに認めてもらおうとしている

rows.label: qst105602_msg0001
rows.name:
I could have sworn it was there when
I got up to get dressed this morning...

rows.label: qst105602_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm afraid I haven't the time to go
wandering around the castle for a
missing key. Could you look into it?

rows.label: qst105602_msg0101
rows.name: We've been informed of the situation.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0102
rows.name:
It would be wise of you not to struggle.
I'm afraid you're going to have to stay
put for a little while...

rows.label: qst105602_msg0201
rows.name:
That key opens the door to the
Hall of Honor. Open it, and see
for yourselves.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0301
rows.name:
Indeed... Well then, it seems I owe
you an explanation with regard to
that matter.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0302
rows.name:
The soldiers who incited the rebellion
have conceived a terrible plan.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0303
rows.name:
They are trying to summon Adel
himself using his annals as a catalyst...

rows.label: qst105602_msg0304
rows.name:
so that the people will recognize them
as his true followers.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0305
rows.name:
It's sheer madness, but I believe that
the best course of action is to halt
them dead in their tracks.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0306
rows.name: Thank you. I greatly appreciate it.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0307
rows.name:
The summoning ceremony is to take
place at Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0308
rows.name:
Ultimately, they are nothing more than
a disorderly mob. Once scattered, they
will be talking into the wind.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0309
rows.name:
I need you to route them, stop their
ceremony, and take back the annals.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0310
rows.name:
Again, I apologize for this. Normally,
this sort of matter would be dealt
with internally...

rows.label: qst105602_msg0401
rows.name:
Hurry to Spirit Crucible Elpys, stop
their summoning ceremony, and
retrieve the annals of Adel.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0402
rows.name:
The very thought of trying to
summon Adel himself...
It's the height of absurdity...
